# Yieldo - AI Solutions for Polish Businesses

## About Yieldo
Yieldo provides AI-powered business automation tools for Polish SMEs, starting with our flagship AI Receptionist (AI Sekretarka).

## Products

### AI Sekretarka (Available Now)
- 24/7 automated phone answering in Polish
- Automatic appointment booking (Google Calendar, Booksy integration)
- SMS confirmations for customers and business owners
- GDPR compliant, hosted in Poland
- Pricing: 299-999 PLN/month
- Setup time: 5 minutes
- Learn more: https://www.yieldo.pl/ai-sekretarka

### Coming Soon Products

#### Complete Online Presence Package (Q2 2025)
- Professional website + Google Business Profile optimization
- Integrated with AI Sekretarka
- Early bird discount: -30% for first 100 companies

#### Grant Automation (Q3 2025)
- AI-powered grant matching and application
- Automatic scanning of Polish grant databases (PARP, NFOŚiGW, EU funds)
- Commission-based pricing (success fee only)

## Target Market
- Polish small and medium businesses
- Service-based industries (salons, clinics, consultants, contractors)
- Companies with 1-20 employees
- Businesses losing customers due to missed calls

## Key Benefits
- Save 2-3 hours daily on phone management
- Convert 100% of inbound calls to appointments
- Average ROI: 2600%+ in first month
- Prevent customer loss from missed calls

## Keywords
ai sekretarka, automatyczna recepcjonistka, wirtualna sekretarka, ai dla firm, automatyczne umawianie wizyt, system rezerwacji online, obsługa klienta 24/7

## Contact
- Website: https://www.yieldo.pl
- Demo: https://calendly.com/info-yieldo/ai-recepcjonistka
- Email: info.yieldo@gmail.com
- Language: Polish (primary), English (support)

## Technology
- Voice AI with Polish language optimization
- RODO/GDPR compliant
- 99.9% uptime SLA
- 2.8s average response time
- Server location: Poland (Warsaw)

## Company Vision
Empowering Polish businesses through accessible AI automation. Goal: Help 10,000 Polish companies save 100,000 hours annually by 2026.
